vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σαργάν-η [γᾰ], ἡ,
= ταργάνη, plait, braid, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 basket, [NT+4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (large flexible) basket, possibly made of ropes
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(large flexible) basket, possibly made of ropes
twisted, or plaited work; a netword of cords like a basket, basket of ropes, etc. 2Cor. 11:33*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 用繩索做成的筐子 #林後 11:33|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 用绳索做成的筐子 #林后 11:33|
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: một cái giỏ làm bằng dây thừng
